channel.title: Where are the Gandhians on Osho - The complete works of Osho
channel.description: Recent content in Where are the Gandhians on Osho - The complete works of Osho

image.title: Osho - The complete works of Osho

item.description: < Previous | Contents â€ŒCHAPTER 1 July 19th 1969 pm in K. C. College, Bombay, India [Note: this is an adaptation from Hindi, which was prepared for publication, but not published. It is for reference only.] It was noon, everything around was still, silent. I was sitting on a bench, underneath a statue of Mahatmaji, in a garden of the capitol. I thought of asking Gandhiji the whereabouts of true Gandhians.
